claim.claim_preamble: A Kyropoulos sapphire single crystal growing apparatus

claim.body: the crucible having the horizontal cross section in the elliptic shape, a ratio of a short axis of the ellipse to a long axis thereof is 20% or less.
claim.claim-text: 2. The apparatus according to claim 1 , wherein, in the crucible having the horizontal cross section in the elliptic shape, a ratio of a short axis of the ellipse to a long axis thereof is 20% or less.

claim.body: the long-axis heating element uses a single heater and the short axis heating element uses a multi-heater.
claim.claim-text: 3. The apparatus according to claim 1 , wherein the long-axis heating element uses a single heater and the short axis heating element uses a multi-heater.

claim.body: the short-axis heating element includes heater rods which are more densely arranged than those in the long-axis heating element.
claim.claim-text: 4. The apparatus according to claim 1 , wherein the short-axis heating element includes heater rods which are more densely arranged than those in the long-axis heating element.
